tool.name: Segment-->Extract
tool.description: Runs segmentation and extracts intensity data from each segmeted cell.

param.name: input_image_path
param.label: Enter path to data you would like processed. Make sure path exists. Note that RoboData/your_folders = /media/sf_Data/your_folders

param.name: output_results_path
param.label: Enter path to where you would like output to go. Make sure path exists. Note that RoboData/your_folders = /media/sf_Data/your_folders

param.name: morphology_channel
param.label: Enter morphology channel identifier. This should match the characters in filename. Ex. RFP, FITC

tool.help: Runs all steps from segmentation to extraction of cell data on a given set of images.
